mapper.select: SELECT #{id} as NOTI_ID ,CompanyName as CMP_NM ,OwnerName as RPSNTV_NM ,BusinessNum as BIZ_NO ,CC.OpenBidTime as BDDPR_DT ,WritePrice as BDDPR_AMT ,ROUND( IFNULL( WritePrice / NB.BasePrice * 100 / NB.NoticeLowLimit * 100, 0), 4) as BDDPR_RT ,Position as CMP_RANK ,ChoiceNumber as CHOICE_PRDPRC_NO ,Etc as RMARK FROM NoticeTables.S_ContestCompany CC, NoticeTables.N_NoticeBase NB WHERE CC.KeyBaseTable = NB.Idx AND CC.KeyBaseTable = #{prfId}
